Title: Relates to labeling of packaging for electronic cigarette products
Summary: Relates to labeling of packaging for electronic cigarette products; requires such packaging to bear brightly-colored labeling indicating that such products contains nicotine or may be used to inhale nicotine vapors.
LawCode: Amd ยง1399-gg, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to labeling of packaging for electronic cigarette products
